items.title: pizza_son Bot
items.text: A Twitch chat bot written in Go.

items.title: Features
items.text:
• Chat commands with permission levels
  • Markov chain text generation
  • Ollama LLM integration
  • Ada learning chatbot
  • Weather lookup
  • Much more!

items.title: Commands
items.text:
Use the search bar above to find a specific command.

Usage notation

  • <argument> — required
  • [argument] — optional

items.title: !8ball
items.text:
Get an accurate answer for any question you desire.

Usage: !8ball <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !ada
items.text:
Chat with Ada, the learning chatbot.

Usage: !ada <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !cat
items.text:
Responds as a cat.

Usage: !cat <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !commands
items.text:
Returns site to all commands.

Usage: !commands

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !hug
items.text:
Hugs the target user.

Usage: !hug [user]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !iq
items.text:
Shows the IQ of target user.

Usage: !iq [user]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !lark
items.text:
Reinterprets a message from !mark using an LLM.

Usage: !lark [text]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !llm
items.text:
Responds as a basic LLM.

Usage: !llm <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !lobotomize
items.text:
Clears the LLM's memory in this channel.

Usage: !lobotomize

Permission: Moderator

items.title: !mark
items.text:
Responds using a markov chain algorithm trained on this chat.

Usage: !mark [text]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !math
items.text:
Responds as a math assistant.

Usage: !math <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !nsfw
items.text:
Responds as a spicy LLM ;)

Usage: !nsfw <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !pee
items.text:
Pees on the target user.

Usage: !pee [user]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !perm
items.text:
Returns the lowest permission level for calling user.

Usage: !perm

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !ping
items.text:
Responds with Pong!

Usage: !ping

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !pp
items.text:
Shows the pp size of target user.

Usage: !pp [user]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !quote
items.text:
Manage and retrieve quotes. Only VIP's can add new quotes.

Usage: !quote | !quote <number> | !quote add <text>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !reloadconfig
items.text:
Reloads the config file.

Usage: !reloadconfig

Permission: Bot Moderator

items.title: !rnn
items.text:
Generates text using a pre-trained RNN model based off over 97k messages across few channels the bot has lurked in over a few months.

Usage: !rnn [text-to-continue]

Permission: Everyone

items.title: !weather
items.text:
Gets the temperature for a location.

Usage: !weather <location>

Permission: Everyone

items.title: Permission Levels
items.text: Level Description Everyone All viewers Subscriber Channel subscribers VIP Channel VIPs Moderator Channel moderators Bot Moderator Bot-specific moderators Streamer The broadcaster
